title: Can a wolf puppy have white eyes? - Quora

response.answer_text: (Wolf genetics) Wolf Genetics: EYES | Young wolf pups are born with blue eyes, which are actually quite striking, but they grow out of this by adolescence. Some adult wolves can appear to have blue eyes but their eyes aren't truly a blue shade, instead they are a very light gray that is semi reflective. Wolfdogs can in fact have blue eyes, but it does have limitations. For a wolfdog to have blue eyes they need to have to be more dog than wolf. Therefore a wolfdog with blue eyes would be low-content. Many wolfdog breeders have tried to make higher content carry the gene but it has yet to be successful. Below is an illustration of known wolf eye colors:
